intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Finally. This is Cheve.

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: Oh, I hope Ryoma is here...

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: He's the toughest person I've ever met, but... I'm still worried.

intro.speaker: Hinoka
intro.line: Have faith, Takumi. Soon, the six of us will be reunited in the fight against Nohr!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I agree. I'm confident we're on the right path.

intro.speaker: Hinoka
intro.line: Hmm, someone's coming this way.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Who is it?

intro.speaker: Hinoka
intro.line: I can't tell yet. Look, over there, coming out of the shadows.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: It can't be Xander. He couldn't have tracked us down so quickly. Wait. That's not Xander. But it's definitely trouble...

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Ah. I see you miss your big sister.

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Heh. You're so...cute.

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Oh, my darling Corrin! I missed you so much...A little birdie told me that you were coming here, and I just couldn't resist.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Camilla!

intro.speaker: Hinoka
intro.line: Back off, lady! That's my brother/sister you're smothering.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: No, Hinoka...it's OK.

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: So, this is your new big sister, eh? Hmm...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Camilla... I hope you know I could never replace you. But I couldn't stand for what King Garon represents, either. I had to make an impossible decision...

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Well, I'm happy for you. I'm happy to see you with your new siblings and your new friends. All I ever wanted was for you to be loved! So I'm glad that you are, even though we're not together any longer.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Camilla...

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: If only this joy could last, baby brother/sister... Oh, how I wish it didn't have to be this way.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: What are you doing?

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: Look out, Corrin!

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Will someone hurry up and take her out?

intro.speaker: Hinoka
intro.line: I'm working on it!

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Oh, I'm so terribly jealous of you all. My dear Corrin chose you. He'll/She'll never be our brother/sister again. I'll never get to sing him/her to sleep. We've loved him/her for most of his/her life, but I guess that wasn't enough in the end... I'll make you pay for taking him/her from us! You'll all die, here and now!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Camilla, no!

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: Is it time, milady?

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Yes, yes. Sorry for the delay.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Hans?!

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: I'm sorry, dearest Corrin. I wish all could be as it was, but I came here to fight. I won't allow you to meet with the Hoshidan prince! Hans and my lovely retainers will help me take good care of you!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Camilla, please! No!

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: I love you, Corrin. But if you survive long enough to make it all the way up here... I will do what I must and pierce your body with my blade. And then cradle you in my arms...just as I did when you were a child.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Sister...

visit.speaker: Old Woman
visit.line: You must be from Hoshido, right? No need to hide it from me! People here are fed up with Nohr. We're on your side! Here, I don't have much, but maybe this will help. Good luck!

visit.speaker: Girl
visit.line: I heard that the resistance fighters have some mysterious new recruit. If you meet up with them, can you give the new guy this gift? We need all the help we can get!

visit.speaker: Old Man
visit.line: I spent some time in Hoshido as a younger man. What a wonderful place. Here, take this. It was a souvenir from my time there. This feels like fate!

visit.speaker: Old Man
visit.line: We may be under Nohrian rule, but not everyone here supports the king. Here, take this. Give it to someone who can make good use of it.

visit.speaker: Boy
visit.line: Are you working with the resistance fighters? Their leader is named Scarlet. Here, take this. And keep fighting the good fight!

visit.speaker: Child
visit.line: You're here to fight all those meanies from Nohr, right? Well, take this! I hope you give 'em hell!

boss.speaker: Hans
boss.line: I've always wanted a trophy... I think I'll keep your head in a jar.

boss.speaker: Hans
boss.line: Not again...

boss.speaker: Selena
boss.line: Ugh, you don't deserve to even LOOK at me. Get out of here!

boss.speaker: Selena
boss.line: Whatever. I wasn't even trying my best...

boss.speaker: Beruka
boss.line: My orders are to kill everyone from Hoshido. I will not fail.

boss.speaker: Beruka
boss.line: I've failed...for now.

boss.speaker: Camilla
boss.line: Oh, how I envy all the time you've spent with my dear Corrin...

boss.speaker: Camilla
boss.line: I still love you, Corrin...

boss.speaker: Selena
boss.line: Well, if it isn't Corrin. Do you even remember who I am?

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Um...

boss.speaker: Selena
boss.line: Ugh, whatever! Like I care whether you remember me or not. You're a monster for making Lady Camilla so sad! Now it's up to me to make you pay for breaking her heart!

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Gah!

boss.speaker: Beruka
boss.line: It's not my place to question orders. But still...I don't understand.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: What do you mean?

boss.speaker: Beruka
boss.line: Lady Camilla can't stop talking about how much she loves you. And yet she's ordered me to kill you and all your friends.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: It's complicated.

boss.speaker: Beruka
boss.line: No matter. My mission is to kill, and I will not fail.

boss.speaker: Camilla
boss.line: Ah, Corrin. So we'll get to dance one last time after all.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Camilla. Please clear the way. I don't want to fight you.

boss.speaker: Camilla
boss.line: Well, I don't want to fight you either! But your decision left me no choice.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Can't you see what Garon is doing? I had no choice!

boss.speaker: Camilla
boss.line: Darling, I'm completely talked out. It's time for action. Get over here!

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: Well, if someone had to defeat me...I'm glad it was you, Corrin. Are you going to kill me now? It has to be you... Don't let anyone else do it.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: No, Camilla. I can't just kill you in cold blood.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: Won't you even put a defeated enemy out of her misery? Aww, that's the Corrin I know. So sweet and innocent. But then...why did you betray us, Brother/Sister? Tell me! Why are you fighting for Hoshido?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Camilla, you have to listen to me. King Garon was manipulating me. Possibly for as long as I've been alive!

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: What?! How so?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: The sword he gave me before I left the castle was cursed. He knew I'd fall in with the Hoshidans and get close to the queen. That's when the sword exploded, killing her and dozens of innocent people.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: But...but what would have happened to you, Corrin?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I probably should have been killed as well, if not for Queen Mikoto's sacrifice. Garon surely didn't care if I died, as long as his plan inflamed relations with Hoshido.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: How DARE he even THINK about harming a hair on your precious head! To think that Father has been up to such evil... I can't believe it. I'm sorry, Corrin. I had no idea.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Hold! Who's there?

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Stay right where you are, traitor. And please stop trying to brainwash my sister.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Leo! I'm glad you're here. Camilla and I have something to-

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Enough. Sorry for the delay, Sister. I'll take over from here.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: No, Leo! Listen to Corrin. He's/She's still the same person we knew.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Sister... Listen carefully. He's/She's fooling you. Do not allow him/her to do so!

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: But...

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Please stand back, Sister. Your wounds are serious. You should be resting.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: I'll take it from here... I'm the only little brother you have left, after all.

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: Leo...

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Listen up, Corrin! I'm coming for you and all your friends. That's the only way to fix what you've broken. If you don't want to be my brother/sister, fine! I'll erase you from my heart forever!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: No!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Argh!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: What's happening?

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Who are you?
Wouldn't you like to know?

end.speaker: Hans
end.line: How dare you attack Lord Leo! Prepare to die for your mistake.
Heh. And how do you propose defeating us with so few soldiers?

end.speaker: Hans
end.line: What are you talking about?
Soldiers! Sally forth!

end.speaker: Scarlet
end.line: We're on it! Look at those pathetic losers. We can take 'em, no problem.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Where did you come from? When did the resistance get this strong?

end.speaker: Hans
end.line: Milord, we must retreat. We don't have a chance against these numbers.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Damn it! If Camilla weren't injured, we could make a stand... But I think you're right. We have no choice but to leave. This isn't over, Corrin!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Whew...

end.speaker: Scarlet
end.line: Ha! They turned tail and ran! I guess the Nohrian royal army isn't so tough after all!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Thank you, stranger. I'm not sure what would have happened if you hadn't arrived.

end.speaker: Scarlet
end.line: No problem. I'm Scarlet, by the way.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Nice to meet you. I'm Corrin from Hoshido. So you're the leader of this resistance force we keep hearing about...

end.speaker: Scarlet
end.line: Yeah, that's us. Even though we live in Nohrian territory, we can't stand Garon. That's why we're on your side. The enemy of my enemy is my friend, right?
Heh. Heh.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Oh, and you're the brave soldier who was first on the scene. You weren't scared of Leo at all, were you? I wish I could say we were as brave.
You still don't know who I am, do you?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: No. Should I? Wait...it can't be...

end.speaker: Ryoma
end.line: Haha! Thanks for coming all the way here to my aid, Corrin.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Ryoma! Boy, are we glad to see you!
